content: knit acorns to accompany your knit leaves and pumpkins using just one fall festival bundle you can create colorful decor for everyone s favorite season pattern is written for solid acorn add color work as desired using photos as inspiration one mini hank will make one complete acorn experience level * advanced beginner materials * woolstok worsted bundle 100% fine highland wool 21 mini hanks 5g/12yds 1 bundle fall festival finished measurements * circumference 4 after stuffing * height 3 including stem color shown * mossy green no 1326 earth ivy no 1309 gravel road no 1302 drift wood no 1312 highland fleece no 1303 ember glow no 1323 rusted roof no 1311
